name: KrowdHired
description: Created by award-winning recruitment consultants, our specialist practice covers, information security, cybersecurity, IT security, technology risk and information risk, for permanent and contract roles across commercial in-house positions, consultancies, as well as cyber & information security vendors. We are People focused organization that values Transparency, Quality, and Collaboration to ensure the best talents have access to the right job.
Headline: Delivering Cyber & Information Security professionals to meet your business needs
ShortDescription: We strive to deliver the right Cyber & information Security professionals to meet your business needs.

Highlights.name: Cybersecurity Recruitment Specialists
Highlights.description: KrowdHired is a company that focuses on Cybersecurity Recruitment. They specialize in finding qualified candidates for information security, cybersecurity, IT security, technology risk and information risk roles.

Highlights.name: Target Roles and Industries
Highlights.description: The company helps businesses fill positions in information security, cybersecurity, IT security, technology risk and information risk. This suggests they cater to companies in the technology sector with a focus on cybersecurity.

Highlights.name: Contact Information Provided
Highlights.description: The article includes KrowdHired's contact information, such as phone number, email address, and location. This allows potential clients and candidates to easily get in touch with the company.

enhanced_description: KrowdHired, established in 2018 by award-winning recruitment consultants, is a specialized recruitment consultancy focused on delivering cyber & information security professionals. Their specialist practice covers permanent and contract roles across information security, cybersecurity, IT security, technology risk, and information risk. This includes specific roles such as IT Audit, Risk Assurance; Security Engineering covering Infrastructure, Network, and Platform; and Cyber Security Project & Programme Managers. KrowdHired serves commercial in-house positions, consultancies, and cyber & information security vendors. They operate as a people-focused organization valuing Transparency, Quality, and Collaboration to ensure top talent gains access to the right opportunities, primarily catering to global and large enterprises.
key_use_cases: Filling IT security and technology risk roles
Sourcing IT Audit and Risk Assurance specialists
Hiring Security Engineering (Infrastructure, Network, Platform) talent
Placing Cyber Security Project and Programme Managers
competitive_advantages: Specialized focus in cybersecurity and information security recruitment
Expertise across diverse roles within the cybersecurity domain (e.g., IT Audit, Security Engineering, Project Management)
roi_benefits: Access to specialized and qualified cybersecurity talent
Efficient placement of permanent and contract IT security professionals
Improved talent quality and fit for niche roles
Meeting critical business needs for cybersecurity expertise
primary_users: Hiring Managers (in Cybersecurity, IT, and Risk)
